summary: The life story of the titular Beaumarchais, playwright and adventurer, who gets himself into numerous different scrapes and romantic encounters in 18th Century France.
cast: Fabrice Luchini|Sandrine Kiberlain|Manuel Blanc|Michel Aumont|Jean-François Balmer|Jean-Claude Brialy|Patrick Bouchitey|Evelyne Bouix|Isabelle Carré|José Garcia|Alain Chabat|Pierre Gérard|Judith Godrèche|Murray Head|Axelle Laffont|Martin Lamotte|Guy Marchand|François Morel|Claire Nebout|Michel Piccoli|Michel Serrault|Florence Thomassin|Jacques Weber|Jean Yanne|Dominique Besnehard|André Oumansky|Maka Kotto|Jeff Nuttall|Jay Benedict|Dominic Gould|Niels Dubost|Marc Dudicourt|Cecile Van Den Abeele|Etienne Draber|David Gabison|Marie Delerm|Séverine Ferrer|Roger Brierley|Patrice Laffont|Richard Durden|Jean-Marie Besset|Jean-Claude de Goros|Maurice Illouz|Pascal Thomas|Alex Broutard|Sandrine Le Berre|Léon Clémence|Jean-Philippe Daguerre|Daniel Villattes|Jean Wassmer|Robert Sandrey|Pierre Lopez|Jean-Michel Geneste|William Doherty|Bruno Lochet|Patrice Le Guet|John Armstrong|Eric Wapier|Romain Sellier|Marc Habib|Luc Teyssier D'Orfeuil|Eloise Laffont|Violaine Barret|Nicolas Vayssie|Dominique Dheur|Frédéric Foucault|Xavier Cantat|Jean-Christophe Fleith|Pierre Arditi|Laurent Balandras|Roland Blanche

title: Beaumarchais, el insolente
